speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Filip Kaczmarek, on behalf of the Committee on Development, on the Horn of Africa: EU Regional political partnership for peace, security and development ( 2006/2291(INI) ) ( A6-0146/2007 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Filip Kaczmarek, on behalf of the Committee on Development, on the Horn of Africa: EU Regional political partnership for peace, security and development ( 2006/2291(INI) ) ( A6-0146/2007 ).
agenda_item: EU partnership in the Horn of Africa (debate)
